author: superphiz
content:
Some of you know that I've been developing a program called Eth2-Studymaster where participants can read ten articles over ten weeks and earn a POAP after completing quizzes based on the articles. (Reference: https://www.reddit.com/r/ethstaker/comments/iej8uo/announcing_the_eth2_studymaster_program_earn_a/ and https://discordapp.com/channels/694822223575384095/746732830691688467/746733307609350235). So far In the first week a hundred people have participated in the quiz and are on their way to earning a POAP (The window is still open for about 48 hours if you'd like to participate!). I'm planning to develop a solid repetoire of articles located in reputable sources, but I realize that you all might have awesome suggestions for selected readings. I have a few basic goals for the readings: 
1) They should target a tenth grade reading level 
2) They should not rely heavily on equations 
3)  They should introduce users to reputable sources for further study

Here is a non-exhaustive list of sources I'd like to draw from:
https://blog.ethereum.org/
https://ethereum-magicians.org/
https://vitalik.ca/
https://www.attestant.io/posts/
https://docs.ethhub.io/
https://kb.beaconcha.in/
https://arxiv.org/search/?query=ethereum+staking&searchtype=all&source=header

What suggestions can you provide for articles?
